poem:
Saints in His Prayers  

Pontiff's hand scrolls through divine script,  
halos spin, blessed confusion,  
hashtag hovers crusader's crest  
amidst the gridiron campaign.   

Two wins, seven debts  
at mercy's mercy.  
On these green, contested altars,  
every asking saint's a sinner  
seeking heavenly interception.
